category: news
title: "Intenseye raises $4M to boost workplace safety through computer vision"
excerpt: "Workplace injuries and illnesses cost the U.S. upwards of $250 billion each year, according to the Economic Policy Institute. ERA-backed startup Intenseye, a machine learning platform, has raised a $4 million seed round to try to bring that number way down in an economic and efficient way."
